name: LD 50 - Daybreak
description:
CONTROLS 

  •  Movement: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Mouse button
  • Grappling Claw / Stop Drinking: Right Mouse Button
  • Switch to Revolver: 1
  •  Switch to Shotgun: 2
  • Switch to Cannon: 3

MECHANICS

Eliminate all the villagers. As a vampire, you take damage from sunlight over time. You gain health by drinking the blood of regular villagers, and mana by drinking the blood of mage villagers. To drink blood, grapple villagers with your claw. Using your guns cost mana, so remember to drink the blood of mages as well.

DAYBREAK

You are a vampire, the last of your kind. Try to survive the sunlight of daybreak as you battle through a mob of angry villagers. You know you are just delaying the inevitable, but that does not stop you from taking the villagers down with you.
